item.title: Report I-2023090039
item.description:
Report I-2023090039

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-04
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGE TO CONTAIN 5 AREOSOL CANS THAT WERE NOT DECLARED WITH ANY MARKINGS ON THE PACKAGE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED CHAIN OF COMMAND, NOTIFIED RMP. RMP CALLED HMSC AND REPORTED. HELD FOR ADG COMPLIANCE.

item.title: Report X-2023090026
item.description:
Report X-2023090026

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-11
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: LEAKER WAS CALLED IN. RESPONDER CONTAINED LEAKING PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE PSC. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION/RESEARCH, WAS DISCOVERED UNDECLARED. HMSC WAS CALLED AND THE PROCESS FOR UNDECLARED HAZMATS BEGAN.

item.title: Report X-2023081163
item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: When package arrived in QA i saw that it was leaking so i opened it for inspection thats when i discovered one out of the three cans were punctured. DescribePack: small puncture hole on bottom of can DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: bagged and put all contents into drum

item.title: Report I-2023090016
item.description:
Report I-2023090016

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: Portland
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DELTA AIR LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Delta received notification on 07/24/23 of an undeclared event where lithium-ion batteries inside cell phones in freight marked "Apparel" on the air waybill. The cell phones were discovered during screening and not accepted/transported. Flight#: DL1021 Date: 07/24/2023 AWB: 006-76029693 The event is under investigation to determine root cause and subsequent corrective actions. See the attached pictures.

item.title: Report I-2023080045
item.description:
Report I-2023080045

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-16T00:32:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-23
  • City: Lyons
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: NEXGEN LOGISTICS LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 1
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The driver left the road at around 40mph for an unknown reason. We suspect he had a medical emergency. The truck crashed into several large oak trees and burst into flames. The fire burned the entire truck and truck mounted cargo tank completely down. The product in the tank burned and soaked into the soil.The driver was burned up in the cab to the point that no autopsy or testing could be done.

item.title: Report X-2023080889
item.description:
Report X-2023080889

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-16T00:32:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-04-27
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was notified of a leaking hazmat, and we secured it in a salvage drum. DescribePack: upon inspection the lid was found to be loose, and content leaked out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: leaking package was secured in a salvage drum.
